item.title: About me
item.description:
I’m currently part of Adaptive Consulting where I work as a site reliability engineer, building tools to manage cloud infrastructure and operating highly performant trading technology.

All of us have multiple personas based on our interests. Mine are:

  • Making music and collaborating with friends.

  • Travelling all around Catalunya (and sometimes Europe) with my wife, looking for rock climbing crags.

  • Watching films, reading books, and writing about it.

  • And of course, writing code.

My hope is to, some day, make all of these interests work together and create something unique.
